a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The female labor force participation rate corresponds to the proportion of the female population aged 15
and older that is economically active. All figures correspond to national estimates, without ILO corrections
(see limitations and exceptions in the Sources tab).
Female labor force participation rate (%) in 2020
Female labor force participation rate (%) in 1980
Data source: International Labour Organization (via World Bank)
